E-Mail Messages
Date: Wednesday, 5/1/1973
Subject: Progress of Larry Christenson
Dear Sir,
Larry Christenson has an ERA of 2.61 at AA San Antonio Brewers!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 5/1/1973
Subject: Progress of Bob Heise
Dear Sir,
Bob Heise is hitting the ball well at AA San Antonio Brewers!
He has an AVG of .290, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 5/1/1973
Subject: Progress of Jim Colborn
Dear Sir,
Jim Colborn has nothing more to prove at AA San Antonio Brewers!
He has an ERA of 3.21 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 5/1/1973
Subject: Status of Ed Crosby
Dear Sir,
Ed Crosby isn't hitting the ball at all at AA San Antonio Brewers!
He has an AVG of .193, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director
